meta.description: A company wants to hire new employees to minimize the total salary while satisfying various constraints.

vars.name: hire
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a candidate is hired

objective.name: min_total_salary
objective.expr: sum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
objective.description: Minimize the total salary of hired candidates

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: salary['A'] * hire['A'] + salary['B'] * hire['B'] + salary['C'] * hire['C'] + salary['D'] * hire['D'] + salary['E'] * hire['E']
constraints.description: Total salary must not exceed the budget

constraints.name: min_1_advanced_degree
constraints.description: At least one candidate with a master's or PhD degree must be hired

constraints.name: min_experience
constraints.expr_lhs: experience['A'] * hire['A'] + experience['B'] * hire['B'] + experience['C'] * hire['C'] + experience['D'] * hire['D'] + experience['E'] * hire['E']
constraints.description: Total work experience of hired candidates must be at least 12 years

constraints.name: at_most_one_A_or_E
constraints.description: At most one of candidate A or E can be hired
